Title:
Paxilloboletus gen. nov., a new lamellate bolete genus from
tropical Africa
Keywords:
Boletaceae, Africa, lamellate hymenophore, morphology,
phylogeny, taxonomy
Abstract:
This study presents Paxilloboletus gen. nov., a new
lamellate bolete genus represented by two tropical African species,
Paxilloboletus africanus sp. nov. and Paxilloboletus latisporus sp. nov.
Although the new taxa strongly resemble Paxillus (Paxillaceae), they
lack clamp connections and form a separate generic clade within the
Boletaceae phylogeny. The new species are lookalikes, morphologically
only separable by their spore morphology. Descriptions and illustrations
of the new genus and new species are given, as well as comments on
ecology, distribution and morphological differences with other gilled
Boletaceae.
